div.l: And forth he goth a twenty deuell way
Vn to the bed ther as the myller lay
And wende to haue crope to his felawe Iohn
And bi the myller in crepeth a non
And caughte him bi the necke ⁊and softe spak
A seyde swynes hed wolt thou a wak
For cristes soule ⁊and here a nobull game
For bi that lord that cleped is seint Iame
As I haue thryes in this short night
Swyued the myllers doughter bolt vp right
While that thou hast a coward ben a gast
¶ Ye fals harlot ꝙquod the myller hast
A fals traytoᵘur fals clerk ꝙquod he
Thou shalt a bye bi godes dignyte
Who durst be so bold to disperage
Mi doughter that is come of so hie lynage
And bi the throtebolle he caught Aleyne
And hente him dispitoulsy a yeyne
And on the nose he smot him wᵗith his fyst
Downe ron the blod strem on his brest
And in the flore wᵗith mouth ⁊and nose y broke
Thei walowed as pigges doth in a poke
And vp thei gon ⁊and doıı̄un a yeyne a non
Till at the myller sporned at a ston
And doıı̄un he fell bakward on his wyf
That wiste no thyng of this nyse stryf
For sheo was falle a slepe a lytel wight
Wᵗith Iohn the clerk that waked hur͗e al night
And wᵗith the fall out of hur slep sheo breyde
Help holy cros of Bromholme sheo seyde
A wake symond the deuell is on me falle
In manus tuas lord to the I calle
